purpose: To outline a comprehensive, multi-touch EMOB strategy.
title: A best practice is to have a comprehensive, multi-touch EMOB strategy
cta: Continually monitor & adjust card value proposition, if necessary, to remain relevant & competitive

content_zones.header: A best practice is to have a comprehensive, multi-touch EMOB strategy

tables.title: EMOB Strategy Phases
tables.description: Outline of objectives and activities across different phases of EMOB.

cells:
Develop effective marketing & promotional creative
Ensure efficient sales & application process
Identify key target segments
Offer incentives designed to engage

Month 1
Month 2
Month 3
Month 4
Month 5
Month 6

Increase card activation / unblock rate
Drive initial usage at POS
Reinforce base benefits, value proposition and rewards program through consistent engagement
Drive frequent usage and broaden usage categories
Promote ‘stickiness’ through recurring payment, card-on-file, etc.

Stimulate on-going activity
Drive incremental spend
Encourage breadth & depth of spend
Achieve top-of-wallet card status
Continue promoting account stickiness

Upgrade/migrate members to alternate product, if required
Mitigate attrition
Shield profitable balances
Increase credit utilization / line
Recognize best customers
